C_Cpp.clang_format_fallbackStyle: { BasedOnStyle: Google, ColumnLimit: 0, IndentWidth: 4, AlignTrailingComments: true, AllowShortFunctionsOnASingleLine: None, BreakBeforeBraces: Allman, IndentCaseLabels: true, KeepEmptyLinesAtTheStartOfBlocks: false, Language: Cpp, MaxEmptyLinesToKeep: 1, NamespaceIndentation: None, PointerAlignment: Left, SpacesBeforeTrailingComments: 1, Standard: Cpp17, UseTab: Never }
